thread.title: Meet Pep Guardiola’s Right-Hand Man: A Retired Water Polo Star

author: Joshua Robinson
title: Meet Pep Guardiola’s Right-Hand Man: A Retired Water Polo Star
text:
Wherever Pep Guardiola’s adventures in soccer management take him, he drags his backroom staff behind him like suitcases.
Each member has specific expertise. There is his favorite assistant coach for leading practice. There is his longtime performance analyst. There’s also his preferred fitness specialist. All three have been with him for almost a decade, since his days at Barcelona, and all three followed him to Bayern Munich and Manchester City.
...
